description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller for managing facility bookings in an airport passenger service platform. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, and deleting bookings, interacting with booking and facility repositories, and utilizing data transfer objects and exception handling.

classes.name: BookingController
classes.description: Spring REST controller managing CRUD operations for facility bookings, including listing, retrieval, creation, and deletion.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list bookings filtered by passenger ID and optionally by booking type, returning a list of BookingEntity objects.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific booking by its UUID, throwing NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new booking based on the provided BookingCreateRequest, generating a new UUID, setting default values, and saving the entity.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a booking by its UUID, throwing NotFoundException if the booking does not exist.
